 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000004_000016" lang="eng" title="bbox 384 1737 959 1767" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000004_000026" title="bbox 384 1737 959 1767; baseline 0 -8; x_size 30; x_descenders 8; x_ascenders 8">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000004_000155" title="bbox 501 1737 672 1767; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 31">bibliographic</span>

 <div class="ocr_page" id="page_000007" title="image &quot;/tmp/Ivan Pavlov Exploring the Animal Machine (Oxford Portraits in Science) by Daniel Todes (z-lib.org)_jp2/Ivan Pavlov Exploring the Animal Machine (Oxford Portraits in Science) by Daniel Todes (z-lib.org)_0007.jp2&quot;; bbox 0 0 1803 2796; ppageno 0; scan_res 70 70">
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000007_000000" title="bbox 541 761 1241 864">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000007_000000" lang="eng" title="bbox 541 761 1241 864" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000007_000000" title="bbox 541 761 1241 864; baseline 0.001 -1; x_size 117.39716; x_descenders 14.397162; x_ascenders 33">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000000" title="bbox 541 761 1241 864; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 121">Introduction</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000007_000001" title="bbox 158 1237 1250 2466">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000007_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 158 1237 1250 1769" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000007_000001" title="bbox 158 1237 1250 1279; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000001" title="bbox 158 1237 274 1269; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">When</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000002" title="bbox 296 1237 339 1269; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000003" title="bbox 361 1249 424 1269; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000004" title="bbox 448 1239 491 1269; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">80</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000005" title="bbox 512 1249 602 1279; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">years</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000006" title="bbox 626 1237 693 1274; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">old,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000007" title="bbox 718 1239 796 1269; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">Ivan</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000008" title="bbox 818 1237 940 1269; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000009" title="bbox 960 1237 1108 1279; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">plucked</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000010" title="bbox 1129 1249 1170 1269; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">an</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000011" title="bbox 1192 1237 1250 1269; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">old</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000007_000002" title="bbox 158 1299 1249 1341; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000012" title="bbox 158 1299 253 1331; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">book</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000013" title="bbox 274 1299 327 1331; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">off</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000014" title="bbox 341 1299 396 1331; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000015" title="bbox 417 1299 534 1341; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">library</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000016" title="bbox 555 1299 646 1336; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">shelf,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000017" title="bbox 670 1299 803 1341; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">opened</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000018" title="bbox 823 1301 847 1331; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000019" title="bbox 867 1299 1091 1341; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">immediately</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000020" title="bbox 1111 1308 1146 1331; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000021" title="bbox 1167 1310 1249 1341; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">page</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000007_000003" title="bbox 159 1362 1250 1404; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000022" title="bbox 159 1364 235 1399; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">230,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000023" title="bbox 259 1362 323 1394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000024" title="bbox 344 1362 505 1404; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">displayed</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000025" title="bbox 525 1364 549 1394; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000026" title="bbox 570 1362 808 1404; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">sentimentally</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000027" title="bbox 829 1371 863 1394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000028" title="bbox 886 1374 901 1394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000029" title="bbox 922 1362 1039 1394; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">friend.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000030" title="bbox 1064 1362 1136 1394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000007_000031" title="bbox 1156 1362 1250 1394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">book</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000008_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 547 426 1647 843" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000008_000103" title="bbox 1264 750 1376 781; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">power</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000008_000104" title="bbox 1394 739 1435 771; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000008_000105" title="bbox 1446 739 1493 771; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">all.</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000008_000019" title="bbox 548 801 1646 843; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000009_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 158 861 1265 1460" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000009_000114" title="bbox 1198 986 1258 1018; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">still</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000009_000012" title="bbox 158 1048 1265 1090; baseline 0 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000009_000013" title="bbox 159 1111 1265 1153; baseline 0 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000009_000123" title="bbox 159 1113 365 1153; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">imaginative</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000012_000005" lang="eng" title="bbox 548 2300 1651 2467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000012_000040" title="bbox 623 2300 1650 2342; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000016_000302" title="bbox 1344 2240 1532 2280; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">gymnastics</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000016_000032" title="bbox 549 2300 1651 2342; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000016_000307" title="bbox 788 2300 876 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">these</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000019_000233" title="bbox 640 1736 743 1776; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Many</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000019_000346" title="bbox 378 2493 439 2516; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">not</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000022" title="bbox 155 1759 1554 1801; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000287" title="bbox 155 1768 215 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">not</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000288" title="bbox 234 1768 283 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">eat</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000289" title="bbox 300 1761 324 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000290" title="bbox 341 1759 478 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">because</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000291" title="bbox 496 1761 520 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000292" title="bbox 537 1761 560 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000293" title="bbox 580 1759 665 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">close</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000294" title="bbox 684 1768 718 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000295" title="bbox 738 1759 936 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">dinnertime</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000296" title="bbox 955 1759 1018 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000297" title="bbox 1034 1771 1116 1801; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">your</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000298" title="bbox 1132 1768 1257 1801; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">parents</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000299" title="bbox 1277 1771 1326 1791; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">are</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000300" title="bbox 1344 1759 1554 1801; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">watching—</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000023" title="bbox 154 1821 1551 1863; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000301" title="bbox 154 1833 221 1863; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">you</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000305" title="bbox 597 1830 631 1853; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000306" title="bbox 653 1821 829 1858; x_wconf 44; x_fsize 43">Sechenov,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000307" title="bbox 851 1821 946 1863; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">really</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000308" title="bbox 966 1821 1100 1863; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">making</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000309" title="bbox 1119 1833 1134 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000310" title="bbox 1155 1821 1219 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">free</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000311" title="bbox 1241 1821 1395 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">decision.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000312" title="bbox 1418 1821 1551 1858; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Rather,</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000024" title="bbox 155 1884 1552 1926; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000313" title="bbox 155 1884 245 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">there</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000314" title="bbox 264 1886 287 1916; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000315" title="bbox 308 1896 323 1916; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000316" title="bbox 342 1896 481 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">nervous</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000317" title="bbox 500 1895 626 1926; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">process</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000318" title="bbox 647 1884 748 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">called</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000319" title="bbox 766 1884 943 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">inhibition</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000320" title="bbox 962 1884 1030 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000321" title="bbox 1049 1896 1124 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">goes</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000322" title="bbox 1144 1893 1179 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000324" title="bbox 1297 1884 1388 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">brain</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000325" title="bbox 1408 1884 1471 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000326" title="bbox 1489 1896 1552 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">says</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000025" title="bbox 157 1946 1554 1988; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000327" title="bbox 157 1947 280 1978; x_wconf 69; x_fsize 38">“Don't</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000328" title="bbox 297 1955 346 1978; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 38">eat</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000329" title="bbox 362 1946 460 1978; x_wconf 28; x_fsize 38">that!”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000330" title="bbox 479 1948 540 1978; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 38">For</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000331" title="bbox 556 1946 732 1983; x_wconf 73; x_fsize 38">Sechenoy,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000332" title="bbox 750 1946 928 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">inhibition</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000333" title="bbox 944 1948 967 1978; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000334" title="bbox 985 1946 1048 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">also</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000335" title="bbox 1066 1958 1081 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000336" title="bbox 1097 1946 1204 1978; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 38">reflex.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000337" title="bbox 1224 1946 1396 1978; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 38">Sechenov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000338" title="bbox 1411 1946 1554 1988; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">thought</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000026" title="bbox 155 2008 1554 2050; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000339" title="bbox 155 2008 197 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000340" title="bbox 216 2008 280 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000341" title="bbox 298 2008 484 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">discovered</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000342" title="bbox 501 2008 590 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">these</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000343" title="bbox 609 2008 789 2050; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">inhibitory</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000344" title="bbox 808 2017 931 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">centers</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000345" title="bbox 950 2010 984 2039; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 43">in</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000347" title="bbox 1075 2008 1175 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">brain.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000348" title="bbox 1196 2010 1251 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">He</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000349" title="bbox 1270 2008 1390 2050; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">argued</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000350" title="bbox 1407 2008 1475 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000351" title="bbox 1493 2020 1554 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">our</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000027" title="bbox 154 2071 1554 2113; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000352" title="bbox 154 2071 268 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">bodies</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000353" title="bbox 288 2071 367 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">have</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000354" title="bbox 388 2083 427 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">an</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000355" title="bbox 447 2083 627 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">enormous</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000357" title="bbox 807 2071 848 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000360" title="bbox 1092 2071 1273 2113; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">inhibitory</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000361" title="bbox 1292 2071 1554 2103; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">mechanisms—</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000028" title="bbox 156 2133 1553 2175; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000362" title="bbox 156 2133 219 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000363" title="bbox 238 2133 306 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000364" title="bbox 325 2133 414 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">these</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000368" title="bbox 1017 2145 1067 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000369" title="bbox 1088 2133 1138 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">do.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000370" title="bbox 1162 2135 1259 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">From</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000371" title="bbox 1278 2133 1333 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000372" title="bbox 1354 2133 1413 2175; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">day</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000373" title="bbox 1431 2145 1482 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000374" title="bbox 1504 2145 1553 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">are</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000029" title="bbox 154 2196 1551 2238; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000375" title="bbox 154 2196 251 2233; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">born,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000376" title="bbox 275 2196 313 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">all</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000377" title="bbox 334 2196 375 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000378" title="bbox 389 2208 450 2228; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 38">our</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000379" title="bbox 471 2196 809 2238; x_wconf 90; x_fsize 38">experiences—with</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000380" title="bbox 830 2205 942 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">nature</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000381" title="bbox 964 2196 1027 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000382" title="bbox 1046 2196 1128 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">with</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000383" title="bbox 1150 2208 1210 2228; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">our</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000384" title="bbox 1231 2196 1375 2233; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">families,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000385" title="bbox 1398 2196 1551 2233; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">teachers,</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000030" title="bbox 155 2258 1550 2300; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000386" title="bbox 155 2258 286 2295; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">friends,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000387" title="bbox 310 2258 374 2290; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000388" title="bbox 394 2258 653 2300; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">society—form</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000389" title="bbox 675 2270 690 2290; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">a</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000393" title="bbox 1091 2258 1154 2290; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000021_000031" title="bbox 156 2321 1554 2363; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000396" title="bbox 156 2321 342 2358; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Therefore,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000397" title="bbox 360 2321 479 2363; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">people</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000398" title="bbox 495 2321 574 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">who</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000399" title="bbox 591 2321 634 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">do</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000400" title="bbox 652 2321 742 2363; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">good</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000402" title="bbox 881 2333 930 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">are</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000405" title="bbox 1297 2321 1472 2358; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">machines;</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000021_000406" title="bbox 1491 2321 1554 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000052" title="bbox 1171 550 1255 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">their</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000008" title="bbox 161 675 1253 717; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000204" title="bbox 728 1675 870 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">students</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000206" title="bbox 1014 1687 1097 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">soon</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000207" title="bbox 1113 1684 1203 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">attest</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000208" title="bbox 1218 1684 1252 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000025" title="bbox 161 1738 1255 1780; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000209" title="bbox 161 1739 256 1770; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">Ivan’s</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000210" title="bbox 277 1738 388 1780; x_wconf 89; x_fsize 43">“good</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000211" title="bbox 405 1738 509 1770; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">moral</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000212" title="bbox 526 1739 790 1780; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">temperament,”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000213" title="bbox 810 1740 986 1780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">reporting,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000214" title="bbox 1008 1739 1040 1769; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">“I</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000215" title="bbox 1060 1738 1138 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">have</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000216" title="bbox 1157 1750 1255 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">never</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000026" title="bbox 160 1800 1253 1842; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000217" title="bbox 160 1800 294 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">noticed</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000218" title="bbox 312 1802 346 1831; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000219" title="bbox 364 1800 435 1831; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">him</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000220" title="bbox 454 1812 514 1842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">any</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000221" title="bbox 532 1800 616 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">ideas</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000222" title="bbox 636 1809 786 1842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">contrary</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000223" title="bbox 804 1809 838 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000224" title="bbox 857 1800 913 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000225" title="bbox 932 1800 1097 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Christian</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000226" title="bbox 1115 1800 1253 1842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">religion</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000027" title="bbox 161 1863 589 1895; baseline 0.002 -1; x_size 42.338867; x_descenders 10.338869; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000227" title="bbox 161 1875 197 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">or</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000228" title="bbox 211 1863 353 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">harmful</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000229" title="bbox 367 1872 402 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000230" title="bbox 417 1863 472 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000231" title="bbox 487 1864 589 1895; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">state.”</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000023_000005" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1925 1255 2467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000028" title="bbox 236 1925 1254 1967; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000232" title="bbox 236 1926 335 1957; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 38">Ivan’s</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000233" title="bbox 358 1925 518 1967; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">thoughts</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000234" title="bbox 542 1925 606 1957; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000235" title="bbox 628 1927 831 1967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">aspirations,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000236" title="bbox 855 1925 1020 1962; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">however,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000237" title="bbox 1044 1925 1109 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">had</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000029" title="bbox 161 1988 1253 2030; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000239" title="bbox 161 1988 341 2030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">decisively</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000240" title="bbox 363 1988 555 2020; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">elsewhere.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000241" title="bbox 581 1990 619 2019; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">In</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000242" title="bbox 644 1990 731 2020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">1869</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000243" title="bbox 754 1988 797 2020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">he</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000245" title="bbox 915 1988 964 2020; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000246" title="bbox 987 1988 1096 2020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">father</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000248" title="bbox 1210 1988 1253 2020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">he</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000030" title="bbox 159 2050 1250 2092; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000249" title="bbox 159 2050 272 2082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">would</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000250" title="bbox 288 2059 348 2082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">not</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000251" title="bbox 364 2059 475 2082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">return</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000252" title="bbox 491 2059 526 2082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000255" title="bbox 792 2050 842 2082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">for</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000260" title="bbox 1153 2050 1250 2092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">study.</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000031" title="bbox 160 2113 1253 2155; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000261" title="bbox 160 2115 214 2145; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">He</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000262" title="bbox 229 2125 292 2145; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000263" title="bbox 308 2122 368 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">not</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000264" title="bbox 384 2115 485 2155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">going</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000265" title="bbox 500 2122 534 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000266" title="bbox 550 2113 592 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">be</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000267" title="bbox 597 2109 615 2159; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000268" title="bbox 639 2115 747 2155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">priest;</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000269" title="bbox 765 2113 877 2150; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">rather,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000270" title="bbox 895 2113 937 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000271" title="bbox 953 2113 1066 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">would</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000272" title="bbox 1080 2113 1183 2155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">spend</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000273" title="bbox 1198 2113 1253 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000032" title="bbox 160 2175 1255 2217; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000274" title="bbox 160 2184 238 2207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">next</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000275" title="bbox 254 2187 327 2217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">year</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000276" title="bbox 344 2175 496 2217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">studying</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000277" title="bbox 512 2175 563 2207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">for</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000279" title="bbox 654 2184 805 2207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">entrance</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000282" title="bbox 1003 2177 1045 2207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">St.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000283" title="bbox 1065 2175 1255 2217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Petersburg</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000033" title="bbox 160 2238 1253 2280; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000284" title="bbox 160 2240 355 2280; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">University.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000285" title="bbox 380 2240 453 2270; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 38">Petr</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000286" title="bbox 473 2238 700 2270; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 38">Dmitrievich</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000287" title="bbox 720 2250 784 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000288" title="bbox 807 2238 946 2275; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">furious,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000289" title="bbox 970 2238 1035 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000290" title="bbox 1055 2238 1112 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000291" title="bbox 1132 2238 1253 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">breach</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000034" title="bbox 159 2300 1253 2342; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000292" title="bbox 159 2300 241 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">with</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000293" title="bbox 261 2300 308 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000294" title="bbox 329 2312 388 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">son</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000295" title="bbox 409 2312 506 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">never</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000296" title="bbox 525 2300 620 2342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">really</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000297" title="bbox 640 2300 763 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">healed.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000298" title="bbox 787 2302 872 2337; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">Ivan,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000299" title="bbox 894 2300 1052 2337; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">however,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000300" title="bbox 1075 2300 1139 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000301" title="bbox 1158 2300 1253 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">made</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000035" title="bbox 160 2363 1253 2405; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000302" title="bbox 160 2363 206 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000303" title="bbox 228 2363 382 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">decision.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000304" title="bbox 404 2365 459 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">He</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000305" title="bbox 478 2363 591 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">would</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000306" title="bbox 609 2363 751 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">become</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000307" title="bbox 756 2359 777 2409; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000308" title="bbox 805 2365 904 2405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">priest</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000309" title="bbox 924 2363 965 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000310" title="bbox 977 2363 1033 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000311" title="bbox 1052 2375 1128 2395; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">new</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000312" title="bbox 1149 2363 1253 2405; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">“god-</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000023_000036" title="bbox 161 2425 933 2467; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000313" title="bbox 161 2425 340 2457; x_wconf 78; x_fsize 43">dess”—he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000314" title="bbox 355 2437 416 2457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000315" title="bbox 433 2427 534 2467; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">going</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000316" title="bbox 547 2434 582 2457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000317" title="bbox 596 2425 738 2457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">become</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000318" title="bbox 740 2421 757 2471; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000023_000319" title="bbox 784 2427 933 2457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">scientist.</span>

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000024_000005" title="bbox 169 755 1248 1069">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000024_000005" lang="eng" title="bbox 169 755 1248 1069" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000024_000005" title="bbox 169 755 1248 894; baseline 0 -34; x_size 139; x_descenders 34; x_ascenders 35">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000024_000005" title="bbox 169 755 728 894; x_wconf 78; x_fsize 143">struggling</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000024_000006" title="bbox 172 930 1121 1069; baseline 0.001 -35; x_size 138; x_descenders 34; x_ascenders 34">

 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000024_000006" title="bbox 158 1224 1254 2443">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000024_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1224 1254 1328" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000026_000293" title="bbox 1122 2359 1239 2391; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">Pavlov</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000026_000297" title="bbox 1616 2361 1650 2390; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">in</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000026_000016" lang="eng" title="bbox 740 2421 1650 2463" xml:lang="eng">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000032_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 547 988 1651 1592" xml:lang="eng">

 </span>
 </p>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000035_000241" title="bbox 1137 1802 1253 1842; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">aspira-</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000035_000026" title="bbox 160 1863 1253 1905; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000035_000242" title="bbox 160 1865 255 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">tions.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000035_000243" title="bbox 279 1865 334 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">He</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000035_000252" title="bbox 163 1925 236 1966; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">(real</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000035_000004" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 2300 1254 2467" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000009" title="bbox 1530 300 1572 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">he</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000036_000002" title="bbox 549 425 1650 467; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000021" title="bbox 549 425 614 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">cult</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000023" title="bbox 690 425 810 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">obtain.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000024" title="bbox 834 427 913 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">One</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000025" title="bbox 934 425 1033 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">could</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000026" title="bbox 1052 425 1122 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">find</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000036_000028" title="bbox 1254 425 1331 467; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">only</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000039_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 675 1255 1342" xml:lang="eng">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000040_000007" lang="eng" title="bbox 542 2174 1651 2528" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000040_000029" title="bbox 622 2174 1650 2216; baseline 0 -11; x_size 41; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000158" title="bbox 622 2176 672 2216; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">By</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000159" title="bbox 694 2176 787 2216; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">using</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000160" title="bbox 808 2186 823 2206; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000161" title="bbox 845 2174 978 2206; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">chronic</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000162" title="bbox 1001 2176 1216 2216; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">experiment,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000163" title="bbox 1239 2174 1357 2206; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000164" title="bbox 1377 2174 1441 2206; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000165" title="bbox 1460 2185 1582 2216; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 42">proven</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000166" title="bbox 1603 2174 1650 2206; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 42">his</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000040_000030" title="bbox 547 2236 1650 2278; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000040_000167" title="bbox 547 2238 652 2278; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">point.</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000041_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 675 1254 1457" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000044_000007" title="bbox 258 2546 363 2577; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 32">lecturing</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000044_000012" title="bbox 667 2546 706 2569; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 32">the</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000118" title="bbox 481 2158 546 2190; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 42">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000119" title="bbox 566 2158 735 2190; x_wconf 90; x_fsize 42">Vsevolod</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000120" title="bbox 756 2160 790 2189; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 42">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000121" title="bbox 815 2159 925 2199; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 42">1893).</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000122" title="bbox 951 2158 1015 2190; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">She</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000123" title="bbox 1038 2158 1103 2190; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">also</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000124" title="bbox 1126 2158 1183 2190; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">did</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000125" title="bbox 1204 2158 1255 2190; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">for</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000045_000017" title="bbox 161 2221 1254 2263; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000126" title="bbox 161 2223 236 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Ivan</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000127" title="bbox 257 2221 347 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">what</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000128" title="bbox 367 2221 415 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000129" title="bbox 436 2221 571 2253; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">brother</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000130" title="bbox 591 2223 726 2263; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Dmitry</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000131" title="bbox 747 2221 811 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000132" title="bbox 833 2221 921 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">done</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000133" title="bbox 942 2233 1029 2263; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">years</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000134" title="bbox 1050 2221 1174 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">before:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000135" title="bbox 1198 2221 1254 2253; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">she</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000045_000018" title="bbox 160 2283 1254 2315; baseline 0 0; x_size 42.177418; x_descenders 10.177417; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000136" title="bbox 160 2283 301 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">handled</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000137" title="bbox 321 2283 360 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">all</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000138" title="bbox 378 2283 434 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000139" title="bbox 453 2283 594 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">business</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000141" title="bbox 668 2283 723 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">life</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000146" title="bbox 1210 2295 1254 2315; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">on</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000045_000019" title="bbox 160 2346 1255 2388; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000148" title="bbox 230 2348 368 2378; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">science.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000045_000149" title="bbox 393 2348 465 2378; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Her</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000045_000020" title="bbox 160 2408 1255 2450; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000045_000021" title="bbox 154 2471 927 2513; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000046_000005" title="bbox 547 613 1649 645; baseline 0 0; x_size 42.262104; x_descenders 10.262104; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000046_000057" title="bbox 881 615 936 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">He</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000046_000006" title="bbox 548 675 1651 717; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000047_000030" title="bbox 236 2113 1253 2155; baseline 0 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000047_000266" title="bbox 236 2113 312 2145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">This</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000047_000267" title="bbox 332 2122 557 2155; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">arrangement</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000047_000268" title="bbox 575 2113 638 2145; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">also</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000048_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 547 550 1658 1207" xml:lang="eng">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000048_000012" title="bbox 548 613 1649 655; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000051_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 300 1255 780" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000051_000016" title="bbox 1332 1146 1623 1169; baseline 0 0; x_size 30.619047; x_descenders 7.6190472; x_ascenders 8">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000172" title="bbox 1332 1146 1402 1169; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 31">which</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000173" title="bbox 1414 1146 1492 1169; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 31">Pavlov</span>

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000051_000005" title="bbox 160 1175 1582 1230">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000051_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 1175 1582 1230" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000051_000017" title="bbox 160 1175 1582 1230; baseline 0 -24; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000176" title="bbox 160 1184 224 1207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">tive”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000177" title="bbox 268 1175 319 1207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">for</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000178" title="bbox 362 1175 603 1217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">“physiological</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000051_000179" title="bbox 624 1184 848 1217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">experiments</span>

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000051_000006" title="bbox 160 1238 1643 1342">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000051_000019" title="bbox 160 1300 1643 1342; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 40; x_descenders 8; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000052_000013" title="bbox 549 738 1650 780; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000052_000085" title="bbox 1355 738 1543 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">conducted</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000052_000014" title="bbox 548 800 1650 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000052_000087" title="bbox 548 802 581 837; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 44">it,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000052_000088" title="bbox 599 800 718 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">greatly</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000052_000089" title="bbox 733 800 920 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">facilitating</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000052_000090" title="bbox 934 800 989 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000052_000015" title="bbox 548 863 1018 905; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000052_000004" lang="eng" title="bbox 549 1488 1650 1592" xml:lang="eng">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000053_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 149 300 1254 967" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000053_000005" title="bbox 155 312 247 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">some</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000053_000006" title="bbox 264 300 355 337; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">food,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000053_000007" title="bbox 374 312 389 332; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">a</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000053_000011" title="bbox 734 302 846 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">gastric</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000053_000002" title="bbox 156 363 1253 405; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000053_000016" title="bbox 156 375 253 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">come</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000037" title="bbox 1275 509 1422 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">stomach</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000055_000003" title="bbox 155 571 1552 613; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000039" title="bbox 155 571 211 603; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000040" title="bbox 231 573 410 613; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 44">operation.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000041" title="bbox 431 571 544 603; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 44">When</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000042" title="bbox 563 571 618 603; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000043" title="bbox 638 571 704 613; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">dog</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000055_000044" title="bbox 722 580 784 603; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">eats</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000059_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 300 1255 842" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000059_000001" title="bbox 159 300 1250 342; baseline 0 -10; x_size 41; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000006" title="bbox 159 312 221 332; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 42">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000007" title="bbox 242 301 278 332; x_wconf 44; x_fsize 42">“‘a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000008" title="bbox 297 300 451 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">complex</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000009" title="bbox 469 300 628 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">chemical</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000010" title="bbox 644 300 790 342; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 42">factory.’</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000012" title="bbox 901 312 966 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">raw</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000013" title="bbox 982 300 1128 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">material</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000014" title="bbox 1148 300 1250 341; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">(food)</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000292" title="bbox 161 1863 260 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">could</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000293" title="bbox 274 1863 316 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">be</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000294" title="bbox 333 1863 491 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">absorbed</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000295" title="bbox 506 1865 576 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">into</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000296" title="bbox 593 1863 648 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000297" title="bbox 663 1863 767 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">blood</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000298" title="bbox 783 1863 846 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000299" title="bbox 862 1863 1035 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">circulated</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000300" title="bbox 1050 1863 1254 1905; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">throughout</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000301" title="bbox 1337 1880 1450 1910; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 41">“appetite</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000302" title="bbox 1457 1880 1530 1911; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 41">juice”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000303" title="bbox 1541 1888 1568 1903; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 41">as</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000304" title="bbox 1580 1888 1594 1903; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 41">a</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000059_000031" title="bbox 160 1925 1552 1967; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000305" title="bbox 160 1925 215 1957; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000306" title="bbox 231 1925 367 1957; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">animal’s</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000307" title="bbox 382 1925 477 1967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">body,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000308" title="bbox 493 1925 603 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">where</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000309" title="bbox 618 1927 642 1957; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 44">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000310" title="bbox 655 1925 814 1967; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">provided</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000311" title="bbox 828 1927 1010 1957; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">nutriment</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000312" title="bbox 1025 1925 1088 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000313" title="bbox 1102 1937 1225 1967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">energy.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000314" title="bbox 1333 1934 1468 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">conditional</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000059_000315" title="bbox 1479 1934 1552 1964; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">reflex.</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000059_000010" title="bbox 911 1992 1249 2023">

 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000060_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 251 946 1651 1488" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000011" title="bbox 327 946 1651 988; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000095" title="bbox 327 948 468 978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Russian</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000096" title="bbox 488 946 696 978; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 44">intellectuals</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000097" title="bbox 718 946 879 978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">discussed</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000098" title="bbox 897 946 985 978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">what</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000099" title="bbox 1005 946 1065 978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">this</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000247" title="bbox 681 1759 841 1801; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">infinitely</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000248" title="bbox 858 1759 1084 1801; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">complicated.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000249" title="bbox 1103 1759 1291 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Whenever</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000250" title="bbox 1307 1771 1357 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000251" title="bbox 1373 1759 1454 1791; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">look</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000252" title="bbox 1471 1768 1500 1791; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000253" title="bbox 1516 1759 1651 1791; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">it—and</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000025" title="bbox 252 1821 1650 1863; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000254" title="bbox 252 1821 337 1858; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">here,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000255" title="bbox 355 1830 421 1858; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 43">too,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000256" title="bbox 439 1821 494 1853; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000257" title="bbox 509 1823 650 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">scientist</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000258" title="bbox 664 1823 687 1853; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000259" title="bbox 703 1833 748 1853; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">no</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000260" title="bbox 765 1823 1038 1863; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">exception—we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000261" title="bbox 1054 1830 1139 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">must</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000262" title="bbox 1155 1821 1269 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">decide</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000263" title="bbox 1285 1821 1396 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">which</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000264" title="bbox 1411 1821 1517 1863; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">things</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000265" title="bbox 1533 1833 1583 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000266" title="bbox 1598 1833 1650 1853; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">see</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000026" title="bbox 253 1884 1650 1926; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000267" title="bbox 253 1896 303 1916; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">are</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000268" title="bbox 321 1886 500 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">important</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000269" title="bbox 519 1884 582 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000270" title="bbox 599 1884 711 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">which</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000271" title="bbox 731 1896 780 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">are</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000272" title="bbox 799 1884 1020 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">meaningless.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000273" title="bbox 1043 1886 1079 1915; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">In</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000274" title="bbox 1098 1896 1113 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000275" title="bbox 1131 1896 1205 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">way,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000276" title="bbox 1226 1886 1250 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">it</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000277" title="bbox 1268 1886 1291 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000278" title="bbox 1309 1884 1373 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">like</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000279" title="bbox 1390 1884 1530 1926; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">looking</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000280" title="bbox 1548 1893 1577 1916; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000281" title="bbox 1595 1884 1650 1916; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000027" title="bbox 253 1946 1650 1988; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000282" title="bbox 253 1946 365 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">clouds</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000283" title="bbox 384 1948 418 1977; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000284" title="bbox 436 1946 491 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000285" title="bbox 511 1946 569 1988; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">sky.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000286" title="bbox 592 1946 624 1977; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 43">If</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000287" title="bbox 634 1958 700 1988; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">you</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000288" title="bbox 718 1946 797 1978; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">have</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000028" title="bbox 252 2009 1650 2051; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000298" title="bbox 348 2010 439 2041; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 44">“see”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000299" title="bbox 463 2021 528 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">one</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000300" title="bbox 549 2009 590 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000301" title="bbox 603 2009 692 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">these</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000303" title="bbox 768 2009 823 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000304" title="bbox 844 2009 944 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">cloud</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000305" title="bbox 963 2009 1165 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">formations.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000306" title="bbox 1190 2009 1222 2040; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">If</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000307" title="bbox 1234 2021 1301 2051; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">you</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000308" title="bbox 1321 2009 1400 2041; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">have</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000311" title="bbox 1635 2021 1650 2041; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000029" title="bbox 251 2071 1651 2113; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000312" title="bbox 251 2071 326 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">bird</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000313" title="bbox 348 2083 385 2103; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">or</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000030" title="bbox 251 2134 1651 2176; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000323" title="bbox 251 2134 478 2176; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">philosophers</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000331" title="bbox 1095 2134 1190 2166; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">think</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000332" title="bbox 1211 2134 1311 2166; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">about</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000333" title="bbox 1333 2134 1488 2176; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">anything</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000334" title="bbox 1507 2134 1651 2166; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">without</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000031" title="bbox 253 2196 556 2238; baseline 0.003 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000335" title="bbox 253 2198 347 2238; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">using</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000336" title="bbox 360 2196 556 2238; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">metaphors.</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000060_000009" lang="eng" title="bbox 252 2259 1652 2363" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000337" title="bbox 328 2261 379 2296; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">So,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000338" title="bbox 402 2259 452 2291; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">for</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000339" title="bbox 472 2271 569 2301; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">many</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000340" title="bbox 589 2259 752 2291; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">hundreds</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000347" title="bbox 1485 2259 1526 2291; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000348" title="bbox 1538 2268 1650 2291; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">nature</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000060_000033" title="bbox 252 2321 1652 2363; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000349" title="bbox 252 2321 395 2363; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">thought</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000356" title="bbox 845 2321 939 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">chain</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000357" title="bbox 958 2321 999 2353; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000060_000358" title="bbox 1009 2321 1128 2363; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">being”</span>

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000061_000001" title="bbox 154 446 1554 1863">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000061_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 154 446 1554 1051" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000061_000001" title="bbox 156 446 1552 488; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000006" title="bbox 156 446 219 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000007" title="bbox 238 446 437 488; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">non-living,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000008" title="bbox 458 458 520 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000009" title="bbox 542 446 697 488; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">arranged</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000010" title="bbox 716 448 750 477; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000011" title="bbox 770 458 785 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000012" title="bbox 806 455 893 488; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">great</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000013" title="bbox 913 446 1007 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">chain</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000014" title="bbox 1027 446 1112 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">from</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000015" title="bbox 1131 446 1258 488; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">highest</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000016" title="bbox 1277 455 1312 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000017" title="bbox 1331 446 1452 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">lowest.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000018" title="bbox 1476 446 1552 478; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">This</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000061_000002" title="bbox 155 509 1554 551; baseline 0 -11; x_size 41; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000019" title="bbox 155 509 236 546; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">idea,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000020" title="bbox 255 509 366 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">which</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000021" title="bbox 383 521 444 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000022" title="bbox 463 509 573 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">drawn</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000023" title="bbox 589 509 674 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">from</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000024" title="bbox 690 509 774 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">their</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000061_000025" title="bbox 791 509 914 541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">culture</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000062_000001" title="bbox 623 300 1651 342; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000005" title="bbox 623 300 700 332; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">The</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000062_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 547 1363 1651 2405" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000316" title="bbox 549 2375 642 2405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">eager</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000317" title="bbox 657 2365 867 2405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">anticipation</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000318" title="bbox 882 2363 923 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000319" title="bbox 931 2375 946 2395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000062_000320" title="bbox 961 2363 1054 2395; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 41">meal.</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000062_000004" lang="eng" title="bbox 624 2425 1652 2467" xml:lang="eng">

 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000063_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 154 738 1254 1030" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000069" title="bbox 710 750 776 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">was</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000072" title="bbox 1083 739 1253 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">“appetite</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000063_000009" title="bbox 154 800 1254 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000073" title="bbox 154 801 269 842; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">juice,’</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000074" title="bbox 289 809 375 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">most</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000084" title="bbox 211 863 266 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000085" title="bbox 283 863 430 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">stomach</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000100" title="bbox 160 990 338 1030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">important</span>

 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000063_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1050 1254 1842" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000063_000013" title="bbox 235 1050 1254 1092; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000105" title="bbox 235 1050 358 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000106" title="bbox 379 1050 529 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">thought</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000107" title="bbox 551 1050 622 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000108" title="bbox 644 1050 693 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000109" title="bbox 717 1052 948 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">experiments</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000063_000110" title="bbox 972 1050 1154 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">explained</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000065_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 1113 1254 1530" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000065_000014" title="bbox 236 1113 1253 1155; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000065_000126" title="bbox 236 1115 272 1144; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">In</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000065_000127" title="bbox 296 1115 390 1150; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">1904,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000065_000128" title="bbox 413 1113 530 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000065_000035" title="bbox 236 2425 1253 2467; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000068_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 543 988 1648 1717" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000068_000011" title="bbox 619 988 1647 1030; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000106" title="bbox 619 988 782 1030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">Nobody,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000107" title="bbox 806 988 974 1025; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">however,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000108" title="bbox 999 1000 1061 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">can</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000109" title="bbox 1083 1000 1137 1020; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">see</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000110" title="bbox 1161 1000 1201 1020; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 38">an</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000112" title="bbox 1394 988 1558 1030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">thoughts</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000113" title="bbox 1582 988 1647 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">and</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000068_000012" title="bbox 545 1050 1646 1092; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000114" title="bbox 545 1052 724 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">emotions.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000115" title="bbox 750 1052 827 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">Two</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000116" title="bbox 850 1052 1009 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">scientists</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000117" title="bbox 1033 1062 1093 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">can</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000118" title="bbox 1114 1050 1223 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">watch</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000119" title="bbox 1245 1050 1301 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000120" title="bbox 1323 1062 1412 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">same</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000121" title="bbox 1435 1050 1502 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">dog</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000122" title="bbox 1523 1050 1567 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">do</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000123" title="bbox 1590 1050 1646 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000068_000013" title="bbox 544 1113 1648 1155; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000124" title="bbox 544 1125 630 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">same</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000125" title="bbox 649 1113 743 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">thing</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000126" title="bbox 762 1113 825 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000127" title="bbox 842 1113 921 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">have</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000128" title="bbox 941 1113 1090 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">different</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000129" title="bbox 1109 1115 1262 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">opinions</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000276" title="bbox 544 2050 713 2092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">thinking</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000068_000004" lang="eng" title="bbox 545 2300 1647 2467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000068_000032" title="bbox 620 2300 1647 2342; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000310" title="bbox 666 2300 730 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000068_000311" title="bbox 749 2300 844 2332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">taken</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000068_000033" title="bbox 546 2363 1646 2405; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000069_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 550 1261 1467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000069_000004" title="bbox 234 550 1254 592; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000033" title="bbox 234 550 391 592; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Basically,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000034" title="bbox 410 550 528 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000036" title="bbox 743 562 758 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000042" title="bbox 1124 550 1254 592; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">salivary</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000069_000005" title="bbox 161 613 1253 655; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000043" title="bbox 161 613 268 655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">glands</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000044" title="bbox 286 625 315 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">as</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000051" title="bbox 963 622 992 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">at</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000053" title="bbox 1061 613 1161 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">brain.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000054" title="bbox 1180 613 1253 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">The</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000069_000006" title="bbox 160 675 1253 717; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000055" title="bbox 160 675 289 717; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">salivary</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000056" title="bbox 310 675 428 717; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">glands,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000057" title="bbox 450 675 492 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000058" title="bbox 513 675 577 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">had</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000069_000007" title="bbox 160 738 1261 780; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000063" title="bbox 160 747 194 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000064" title="bbox 213 738 268 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000065" title="bbox 286 738 451 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">influence</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000066" title="bbox 470 738 511 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000069_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 235 2488 1254 2530" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000069_000035" title="bbox 235 2488 1254 2530; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000069_000333" title="bbox 313 2500 379 2520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">was</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000071_000078" title="bbox 1217 740 1253 769; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">In</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000071_000008" title="bbox 159 800 1252 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000071_000079" title="bbox 159 800 248 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">what</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000071_000080" title="bbox 261 812 344 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">ways</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000071_000227" title="bbox 915 1750 957 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">an</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000071_000024" title="bbox 160 1811 318 1842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43.597763; x_descenders 10.618111; x_ascenders 12.5">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000072_000000" title="bbox 549 300 1650 332; baseline 0.001 -1; x_size 42.428696; x_descenders 10.428698; x_ascenders 12">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000072_000001" title="bbox 550 363 1650 405; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000072_000009" title="bbox 550 363 773 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">“conditional</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000072_000014" title="bbox 1284 374 1376 405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">upon</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000072_000015" title="bbox 1394 365 1515 395; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">certain</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000072_000016" title="bbox 1533 363 1650 395; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">condi-</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000073_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 925 1261 1467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000073_000010" title="bbox 235 925 1253 967; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000073_000093" title="bbox 328 925 460 967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">psychic</span>
