 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000073_000012" title="bbox 161 1050 1253 1092; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000073_000107" title="bbox 161 1050 334 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">complex,</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000000" title="bbox 549 302 670 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">certain</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000001" title="bbox 690 300 775 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">basic</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000002" title="bbox 796 309 938 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">patterns</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000003" title="bbox 960 302 994 331; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000004" title="bbox 1016 300 1105 342; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">dogs’</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000005" title="bbox 1128 300 1258 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">salivary</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000006" title="bbox 1279 311 1443 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">responses</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000074_000007" title="bbox 1465 309 1500 332; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 43">to</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000074_000001" title="bbox 548 365 723 395; baseline 0 0; x_size 40.23278; x_descenders 10.232779; x_ascenders 10">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000074_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 547 425 1658 1905" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000074_000002" title="bbox 623 425 1650 467; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000075_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1675 1255 2405" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000075_000022" title="bbox 236 1675 1253 1717; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000218" title="bbox 236 1675 317 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">This</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000219" title="bbox 340 1686 501 1717; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">response</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000220" title="bbox 525 1675 783 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">demonstrated</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000221" title="bbox 803 1675 897 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">what</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000222" title="bbox 919 1675 1043 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000223" title="bbox 1066 1675 1174 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">called</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000224" title="bbox 1195 1675 1253 1707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000075_000023" title="bbox 159 1738 1253 1780; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000225" title="bbox 159 1749 289 1780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">process</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000226" title="bbox 313 1738 355 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000227" title="bbox 370 1738 642 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">differentiation:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000228" title="bbox 667 1738 724 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000229" title="bbox 745 1738 881 1780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">beating</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000230" title="bbox 903 1738 944 1770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000237" title="bbox 652 1800 711 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">but</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000238" title="bbox 726 1800 793 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000239" title="bbox 807 1811 958 1842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">response</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000240" title="bbox 972 1812 1034 1832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000241" title="bbox 1050 1812 1129 1832; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">now</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000075_000251" title="bbox 1022 1865 1157 1895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">minute.</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000189" title="bbox 1118 1552 1152 1581; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000190" title="bbox 1172 1552 1302 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">various</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000191" title="bbox 1323 1562 1407 1592; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">ways</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000192" title="bbox 1429 1559 1464 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000193" title="bbox 1486 1550 1542 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000194" title="bbox 1563 1562 1650 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">same</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000076_000021" title="bbox 549 1613 1650 1655; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000195" title="bbox 549 1615 795 1655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">experiments.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000196" title="bbox 822 1615 885 1645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">For</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000197" title="bbox 908 1613 1076 1655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">example,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000198" title="bbox 1102 1625 1170 1645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">one</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000199" title="bbox 1193 1613 1263 1655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">dog</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000076_000024" title="bbox 548 1800 1650 1842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000220" title="bbox 548 1800 650 1842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">tently</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000240" title="bbox 547 1925 636 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">what</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000258" title="bbox 549 2050 626 2092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">dogs</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000292" title="bbox 1247 2250 1334 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">were</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000294" title="bbox 1479 2238 1594 2270; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">slower</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000295" title="bbox 1615 2247 1649 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000076_000032" title="bbox 549 2300 1651 2342; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000317" title="bbox 1021 2425 1090 2457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000076_000318" title="bbox 1112 2425 1168 2457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000044" title="bbox 451 550 545 582; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">order</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000046" title="bbox 614 550 726 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">knock</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000079_000005" title="bbox 160 613 1254 655; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000054" title="bbox 160 622 320 645; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 44">moment.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000055" title="bbox 342 613 459 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000056" title="bbox 476 622 569 655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">spent</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000057" title="bbox 586 613 633 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000058" title="bbox 652 625 810 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">summers</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000059" title="bbox 830 622 859 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000060" title="bbox 877 613 923 645; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">his</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000079_000006" title="bbox 160 675 1251 717; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000064" title="bbox 160 675 262 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">home</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000065" title="bbox 279 677 313 706; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000068" title="bbox 587 675 698 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">where</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000079_000007" title="bbox 161 738 1253 780; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000074" title="bbox 240 738 314 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">read</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000075" title="bbox 330 738 448 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">novels.</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000079_000008" title="bbox 159 800 1254 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000079_000009" title="bbox 162 863 429 905; baseline 0.004 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000079_000093" title="bbox 162 863 341 895; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 43">“muscular</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000082_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 157 463 475 656" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000087" title="bbox 432 738 495 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000088" title="bbox 513 740 670 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Moscow.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000089" title="bbox 694 739 772 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">“We</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000090" title="bbox 791 738 868 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">shall</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000091" title="bbox 886 750 965 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">now</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000092" title="bbox 982 738 1126 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">proceed</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000093" title="bbox 1144 747 1178 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000094" title="bbox 1198 738 1253 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000083_000009" title="bbox 159 800 897 842; baseline 0 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000095" title="bbox 159 800 308 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">building</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000096" title="bbox 323 800 363 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000097" title="bbox 371 800 555 837; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">socialism,”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000098" title="bbox 572 802 675 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Lenin</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000083_000099" title="bbox 689 800 897 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">proclaimed.</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000083_000002" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 863 1254 1342" xml:lang="eng">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000083_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 235 1363 1253 1405" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000084_000000" title="bbox 544 300 609 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">had</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000086_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 161 1436 467 1628" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000086_000001" title="bbox 162 1436 454 1467; baseline 0 -8; x_size 31; x_descenders 8; x_ascenders 8">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000003" title="bbox 162 1436 222 1459; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 32">From</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000004" title="bbox 235 1436 267 1459; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 32">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000005" title="bbox 278 1436 384 1467; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 32">boyhood</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000006" title="bbox 394 1436 454 1467; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 32">days,</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000086_000002" title="bbox 161 1490 420 1513; baseline 0 0; x_size 30.28006; x_descenders 7.2800589; x_ascenders 8">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000086_000025" title="bbox 622 1488 1650 1530; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000131" title="bbox 622 1490 665 1520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">As</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000132" title="bbox 683 1488 738 1520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000135" title="bbox 1078 1488 1255 1520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">continued</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000136" title="bbox 1272 1497 1306 1520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000086_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 622 2488 1650 2530" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000086_000041" title="bbox 622 2488 1650 2530; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000276" title="bbox 622 2490 762 2530; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">Among</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000277" title="bbox 782 2488 839 2520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000278" title="bbox 860 2490 1056 2530; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">interesting</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000279" title="bbox 1077 2490 1247 2530; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">questions</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000280" title="bbox 1269 2488 1390 2520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000086_000281" title="bbox 1410 2488 1543 2520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">studied</span>

 </span>
 </p>
 </div>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000000" title="bbox 160 300 1254 341; baseline -0.001 -9; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000000" title="bbox 160 300 256 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">these:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000001" title="bbox 273 302 364 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">How</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000002" title="bbox 378 300 421 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">do</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000003" title="bbox 436 300 491 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000004" title="bbox 506 300 704 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">conditional</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000005" title="bbox 718 300 844 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">reflexes</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000006" title="bbox 861 300 901 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000007" title="bbox 907 302 1032 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">various</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000008" title="bbox 1049 300 1176 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">animals</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000009" title="bbox 1194 300 1254 341; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">(for</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000001" title="bbox 161 363 1253 405; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 38; x_descenders 6; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000010" title="bbox 161 363 316 405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">example,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000011" title="bbox 338 363 408 400; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">fish,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000012" title="bbox 430 365 524 400; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">mice,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000013" title="bbox 547 363 635 405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">dogs,</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000017" title="bbox 1172 363 1253 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">with</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000002" title="bbox 161 425 1252 467; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000018" title="bbox 161 425 238 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">each</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000019" title="bbox 256 425 362 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">other?</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000020" title="bbox 380 425 479 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">What</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000021" title="bbox 496 437 545 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">are</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000022" title="bbox 562 425 617 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000023" title="bbox 635 425 780 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">different</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000024" title="bbox 796 425 1009 467; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">personalities</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000025" title="bbox 1030 426 1078 466; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">(or</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000026" title="bbox 1096 426 1252 457; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">“nervous</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000003" title="bbox 160 488 1252 530; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000027" title="bbox 160 489 271 530; x_wconf 89; x_fsize 43">types,’</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000028" title="bbox 289 500 316 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">as</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000029" title="bbox 331 488 445 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000030" title="bbox 459 488 557 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">called</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000031" title="bbox 570 488 670 529; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">them)</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000032" title="bbox 688 488 728 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000033" title="bbox 735 488 826 530; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">dogs?</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000034" title="bbox 840 490 903 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Are</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000035" title="bbox 919 488 1114 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">conditional</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000036" title="bbox 1128 488 1252 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">reflexes</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000004" title="bbox 161 550 1252 592; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000037" title="bbox 161 550 223 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000038" title="bbox 241 550 434 592; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">personality</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000040" title="bbox 660 550 836 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">inherited?</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000041" title="bbox 857 550 941 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">That</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000042" title="bbox 961 552 994 587; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">is,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000043" title="bbox 1016 550 1046 581; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">if</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000044" title="bbox 1060 562 1075 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000045" title="bbox 1095 562 1210 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">mouse</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000046" title="bbox 1230 552 1252 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">is</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000005" title="bbox 160 613 1253 655; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000047" title="bbox 160 613 282 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">trained</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000048" title="bbox 298 622 332 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000049" title="bbox 351 625 413 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">run</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000050" title="bbox 431 613 570 655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">through</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000051" title="bbox 589 625 604 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000052" title="bbox 622 625 712 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">maze</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000057" title="bbox 1192 625 1253 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">run</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000006" title="bbox 160 675 1253 717; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000058" title="bbox 160 675 299 717; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">through</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000059" title="bbox 315 675 370 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000060" title="bbox 386 687 471 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">same</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000061" title="bbox 487 687 576 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">maze</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000063" title="bbox 701 675 829 717; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">quickly</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000064" title="bbox 845 675 921 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">than</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000065" title="bbox 936 675 1028 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">those</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000066" title="bbox 1045 675 1085 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000067" title="bbox 1095 687 1133 707; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">an</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000068" title="bbox 1151 676 1253 707; x_wconf 89; x_fsize 43">“une-</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000007" title="bbox 161 738 1254 780; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000069" title="bbox 161 738 315 770; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 44">ducated”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000070" title="bbox 335 740 464 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">mouse?</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000071" title="bbox 486 738 611 779; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">(Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000072" title="bbox 629 747 658 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000073" title="bbox 675 738 739 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">first</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000074" title="bbox 756 738 896 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">thought</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000075" title="bbox 913 738 955 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000076" title="bbox 972 738 1036 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000077" title="bbox 1051 738 1171 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">proved</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000078" title="bbox 1188 738 1254 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">that</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000008" title="bbox 160 800 1254 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000079" title="bbox 160 800 235 842; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">they</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000080" title="bbox 255 800 419 832; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">did—and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000081" title="bbox 438 800 633 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">announced</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000082" title="bbox 651 800 710 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">this</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000083" title="bbox 731 800 894 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">discovery</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000084" title="bbox 912 800 993 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">with</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000085" title="bbox 1013 809 1098 842; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">great</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000086" title="bbox 1116 800 1254 842; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">pride—</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000009" title="bbox 159 863 1254 905; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000087" title="bbox 159 863 217 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">but</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000088" title="bbox 235 875 297 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000089" title="bbox 316 863 392 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">later</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000090" title="bbox 412 863 593 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">convinced</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000091" title="bbox 611 863 677 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000092" title="bbox 696 863 784 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">these</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000093" title="bbox 805 865 1019 905; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">experiments</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000094" title="bbox 1038 875 1122 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">were</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000095" title="bbox 1142 863 1254 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">flawed</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000010" title="bbox 161 925 1253 967; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000096" title="bbox 161 925 223 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000097" title="bbox 235 925 355 967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">proved</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000098" title="bbox 368 925 507 967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">nothing</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000099" title="bbox 521 934 550 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000100" title="bbox 565 925 623 966; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 44">all.)</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000101" title="bbox 640 925 774 957; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 44">Pavlov’s</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000102" title="bbox 788 925 968 967; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 44">laboratory</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000103" title="bbox 983 925 1045 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">also</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000104" title="bbox 1060 925 1185 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">studied</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000105" title="bbox 1199 925 1253 957; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000011" title="bbox 160 988 901 1030; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000106" title="bbox 160 997 269 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">nature</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000107" title="bbox 284 988 324 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000108" title="bbox 331 988 421 1030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">sleep,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000109" title="bbox 438 988 568 1025; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">dreams,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000110" title="bbox 585 988 647 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000111" title="bbox 660 988 779 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">mental</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000112" title="bbox 792 988 901 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">illness.</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000087_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1050 1261 2467" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000012" title="bbox 234 1050 1254 1092; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000113" title="bbox 234 1052 277 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">As</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000114" title="bbox 295 1052 329 1081; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000115" title="bbox 347 1050 457 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">earlier</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000116" title="bbox 472 1062 569 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">years,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000117" title="bbox 589 1050 706 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000118" title="bbox 722 1062 777 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">ran</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000119" title="bbox 795 1050 842 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000120" title="bbox 859 1050 1067 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">laboratories</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000121" title="bbox 1084 1050 1147 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">like</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000122" title="bbox 1165 1050 1254 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">small</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000013" title="bbox 160 1113 1253 1155; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000123" title="bbox 160 1113 319 1150; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">factories,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000124" title="bbox 340 1113 452 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">telling</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000125" title="bbox 469 1113 516 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">his</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000126" title="bbox 537 1113 717 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">coworkers</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000127" title="bbox 736 1113 891 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">precisely</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000128" title="bbox 909 1113 997 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">what</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000129" title="bbox 1015 1122 1049 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000130" title="bbox 1069 1115 1253 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">investigate</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000087_000014" title="bbox 161 1175 1253 1217; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000131" title="bbox 161 1175 224 1207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000132" title="bbox 239 1175 320 1207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">how.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000133" title="bbox 340 1177 399 1212; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">Or,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000134" title="bbox 418 1187 446 1207; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">as</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000135" title="bbox 464 1187 479 1207; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">a</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000087_000281" title="bbox 764 2238 850 2270; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Take</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000088_000034" title="bbox 622 2425 1650 2467; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000088_000312" title="bbox 622 2425 801 2457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 38">Accidents</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000088_000313" title="bbox 825 2425 918 2457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">often</span>

 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000088_000001" title="bbox 548 2488 1651 2530">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000088_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 548 2488 1651 2530" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000088_000035" title="bbox 548 2488 1651 2530; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000089_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 1050 1255 1592" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000089_000012" title="bbox 236 1050 1253 1092; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000089_000115" title="bbox 236 1050 311 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000089_000116" title="bbox 334 1050 437 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">doors</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000089_000013" title="bbox 159 1113 1252 1155; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000089_000124" title="bbox 159 1122 267 1150; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">water,</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000090_000049" title="bbox 1530 613 1649 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">illness?</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000090_000006" title="bbox 548 675 1650 717; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000090_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 849 2016 1264 2062" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000090_000193" title="bbox 849 2018 974 2062; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 48">Image</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000000" title="bbox 162 300 1253 342; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000000" title="bbox 162 301 194 331; x_wconf 37; x_fsize 43">“TI</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000001" title="bbox 216 300 295 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">have</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000002" title="bbox 316 300 371 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000003" title="bbox 394 309 528 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">greatest</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000004" title="bbox 549 300 658 337; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">desire,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000005" title="bbox 681 309 716 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000006" title="bbox 738 300 793 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000007" title="bbox 815 309 926 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">extent</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000008" title="bbox 947 300 1015 332; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000009" title="bbox 1035 312 1090 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">my</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000010" title="bbox 1111 300 1253 342; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">strength</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000001" title="bbox 159 363 1254 405; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000011" title="bbox 159 365 303 405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">permits,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000012" title="bbox 323 372 357 395; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 44">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000013" title="bbox 375 363 466 405; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">place</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000014" title="bbox 483 363 544 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">this</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000015" title="bbox 562 372 677 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">matter</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000016" title="bbox 696 375 740 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">on</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000017" title="bbox 759 375 774 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000018" title="bbox 792 363 869 394; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">firm</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000019" title="bbox 887 363 950 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000020" title="bbox 966 363 1091 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">fruitful</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000021" title="bbox 1106 363 1185 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">basis</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000022" title="bbox 1204 363 1254 395; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">for</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000002" title="bbox 160 425 1028 467; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000023" title="bbox 160 425 215 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000024" title="bbox 231 437 285 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">use</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000025" title="bbox 301 425 364 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000026" title="bbox 379 425 475 467; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">glory,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000027" title="bbox 492 434 578 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">most</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000028" title="bbox 593 425 634 457; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000029" title="bbox 642 425 689 462; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">all,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000030" title="bbox 706 425 747 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000031" title="bbox 754 437 809 467; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">my</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000032" title="bbox 824 425 1028 457; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">homeland.”</span>
 </span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000091_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 488 1254 1530" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000003" title="bbox 234 488 1250 530; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000033" title="bbox 234 488 338 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">What</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000034" title="bbox 358 500 423 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">was</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000035" title="bbox 446 488 510 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">this</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000036" title="bbox 533 490 720 530; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">important</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000037" title="bbox 742 488 827 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">task?</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000038" title="bbox 849 490 894 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">As</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000039" title="bbox 917 488 1039 520; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Pavlov</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000040" title="bbox 1061 488 1250 530; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">explained:</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000004" title="bbox 162 550 1253 592; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000041" title="bbox 162 551 257 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">“Our</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000042" title="bbox 276 550 370 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">work</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000043" title="bbox 388 550 456 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">will</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000044" title="bbox 475 550 570 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">result</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000045" title="bbox 589 552 623 581; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">in</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000046" title="bbox 643 550 699 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000047" title="bbox 719 562 840 582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">success</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000048" title="bbox 862 550 903 582; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000049" title="bbox 917 550 1172 592; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">eugenics—the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000050" title="bbox 1192 552 1253 582; x_wconf 90; x_fsize 43">sci-</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000005" title="bbox 161 613 1253 655; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000051" title="bbox 161 625 241 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">ence</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000052" title="bbox 259 613 300 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000053" title="bbox 309 613 364 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000054" title="bbox 381 613 613 655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">development</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000055" title="bbox 630 613 670 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000056" title="bbox 680 625 719 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">an</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000057" title="bbox 736 613 905 655; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">improved</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000058" title="bbox 921 613 1045 645; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">human</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000059" title="bbox 1061 614 1162 655; x_wconf 86; x_fsize 44">type.”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000060" title="bbox 1180 613 1253 645; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">The</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000006" title="bbox 159 675 1254 717; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000061" title="bbox 159 675 253 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">word</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000062" title="bbox 275 676 470 717; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 43">“eugenics”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000063" title="bbox 497 675 594 716; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">(from</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000064" title="bbox 617 675 726 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Greek</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000065" title="bbox 745 675 852 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">words</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000066" title="bbox 874 677 1031 717; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">meaning</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000067" title="bbox 1053 675 1166 707; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">“well”</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000068" title="bbox 1191 675 1254 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000007" title="bbox 162 738 1253 780; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000069" title="bbox 162 738 300 779; x_wconf 87; x_fsize 43">“born”)</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000070" title="bbox 318 738 382 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">had</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000071" title="bbox 396 738 482 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">been</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000072" title="bbox 498 738 618 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">coined</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000073" title="bbox 632 738 674 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">by</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000074" title="bbox 688 738 821 780; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">English</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000075" title="bbox 836 740 976 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">scientist</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000077" title="bbox 1133 738 1253 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Galton</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000008" title="bbox 160 800 1253 842; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000078" title="bbox 160 812 255 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">more</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000079" title="bbox 277 800 358 832; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">than</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000080" title="bbox 381 802 423 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">50</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000081" title="bbox 445 812 535 842; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">years</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000082" title="bbox 559 800 675 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">earlier</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000083" title="bbox 697 812 726 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">as</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000084" title="bbox 750 812 765 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000085" title="bbox 787 812 887 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">name</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000086" title="bbox 909 800 961 832; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 44">for</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000087" title="bbox 984 812 999 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000088" title="bbox 1021 812 1099 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">new</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000089" title="bbox 1120 802 1253 832; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">science</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000009" title="bbox 161 863 1250 905; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000090" title="bbox 161 863 304 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">devoted</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000091" title="bbox 324 872 359 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000092" title="bbox 381 863 437 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000093" title="bbox 458 863 638 905; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">biological</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000094" title="bbox 659 865 902 905; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">improvement</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000095" title="bbox 924 863 965 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000096" title="bbox 979 863 1105 895; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">human</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000097" title="bbox 1126 863 1250 905; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">beings.</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000010" title="bbox 162 925 1254 967; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000098" title="bbox 162 925 282 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Galton</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000099" title="bbox 299 925 362 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000100" title="bbox 378 937 475 967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">many</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000101" title="bbox 492 925 586 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">other</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000102" title="bbox 602 927 755 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">scientists</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000103" title="bbox 771 937 856 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">were</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000104" title="bbox 874 925 1058 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">convinced</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000105" title="bbox 1073 925 1140 957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000106" title="bbox 1156 937 1254 967; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">many</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000011" title="bbox 159 988 1252 1030; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000107" title="bbox 159 988 309 1030; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">physical,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000108" title="bbox 331 988 443 1025; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">moral,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000109" title="bbox 466 988 529 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000110" title="bbox 548 988 669 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">mental</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000111" title="bbox 688 990 771 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">traits</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000112" title="bbox 791 1000 876 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">were</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000113" title="bbox 896 988 1068 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">inherited.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000114" title="bbox 1092 990 1252 1020; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">Scientists</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000012" title="bbox 161 1050 1252 1092; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000115" title="bbox 161 1050 224 1082; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000116" title="bbox 245 1059 485 1092; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">governments,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000117" title="bbox 508 1050 585 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">they</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000118" title="bbox 606 1050 772 1087; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">reasoned,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000119" title="bbox 795 1050 914 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">should</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000120" title="bbox 933 1050 1027 1082; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">work</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000121" title="bbox 1047 1050 1197 1092; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">together</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000122" title="bbox 1218 1059 1252 1082; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000013" title="bbox 161 1113 1253 1155; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000123" title="bbox 161 1125 346 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">encourage</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000124" title="bbox 367 1113 488 1155; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">people</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000125" title="bbox 509 1113 591 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">with</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000126" title="bbox 614 1113 768 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">desirable</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000127" title="bbox 790 1115 874 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">traits</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000128" title="bbox 897 1122 931 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000129" title="bbox 954 1113 1033 1145; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">have</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000130" title="bbox 1055 1125 1148 1145; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">more</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000131" title="bbox 1171 1113 1253 1145; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">chil-</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000091_000014" title="bbox 161 1175 1253 1217; baseline 0 -10; x_size 41; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000132" title="bbox 161 1175 249 1212; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">dren,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000133" title="bbox 270 1175 333 1207; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 42">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000134" title="bbox 350 1184 384 1207; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 42">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000135" title="bbox 404 1175 592 1217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">discourage</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000136" title="bbox 613 1176 661 1216; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">(or</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000091_000137" title="bbox 677 1176 821 1217; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 42">prevent)</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000095_000080" title="bbox 580 681 643 715; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 37">give</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000095_000082" title="bbox 864 679 985 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 37">brilliant</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000095_000083" title="bbox 1002 679 1120 707; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 37">lectures</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000095_000009" title="bbox 235 734 1178 770; baseline 0 -9; x_size 36; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 11">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000095_000086" title="bbox 306 734 421 770; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 37">subject.</span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000098_000026" title="bbox 549 1925 1650 1967; baseline 0 -10; x_size 43; x_descenders 11; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000098_000223" title="bbox 549 1934 578 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">at</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000098_000224" title="bbox 600 1937 664 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 44">one</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000099_000005" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 2492 1253 2534" xml:lang="eng">

 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000101_000002" title="bbox 160 2488 1250 2530">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000102_000019" title="bbox 548 1583 1651 1625; baseline -0.001 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000114" title="bbox 548 1595 632 1615; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">soon</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000115" title="bbox 652 1583 729 1625; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">they</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000116" title="bbox 748 1583 862 1615; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">would</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000117" title="bbox 882 1583 983 1615; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">know</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000118" title="bbox 1004 1583 1195 1625; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">everything</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000119" title="bbox 1215 1583 1315 1615; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">about</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000120" title="bbox 1335 1583 1390 1615; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000121" title="bbox 1410 1583 1510 1615; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">brain.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000122" title="bbox 1534 1583 1651 1615; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Pavlov</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000102_000020" title="bbox 548 1646 1650 1688; baseline 0 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000123" title="bbox 548 1646 668 1678; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">turned</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000124" title="bbox 684 1657 775 1688; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">upon</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000125" title="bbox 791 1646 862 1677; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">him</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000126" title="bbox 877 1646 1014 1688; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">fiercely:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000127" title="bbox 1035 1646 1128 1678; x_wconf 82; x_fsize 43">““The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000128" title="bbox 1143 1658 1236 1678; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">more</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000129" title="bbox 1251 1658 1302 1678; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">we</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000130" title="bbox 1318 1646 1469 1683; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">discover,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000131" title="bbox 1487 1646 1542 1678; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000132" title="bbox 1558 1658 1650 1678; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">more</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000102_000021" title="bbox 548 1708 1651 1750; baseline 0.001 -11; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000133" title="bbox 548 1708 603 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000134" title="bbox 625 1708 796 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">unknown</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000135" title="bbox 816 1708 884 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">will</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000136" title="bbox 903 1708 1005 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">reveal</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000137" title="bbox 1025 1708 1113 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">itself</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000138" title="bbox 1127 1708 1190 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000139" title="bbox 1209 1708 1264 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000140" title="bbox 1285 1720 1378 1740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">more</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000141" title="bbox 1399 1710 1563 1750; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">questions</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000142" title="bbox 1583 1708 1651 1740; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 43">will</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000102_000004" title="bbox 549 1771 1532 1813">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000102_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 549 1771 1532 1813" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000102_000022" title="bbox 549 1771 1532 1813; baseline 0 -10; x_size 42; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 12">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000143" title="bbox 549 1772 652 1808; x_wconf 88; x_fsize 43">arise,’</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000144" title="bbox 669 1771 711 1803; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">he</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000145" title="bbox 725 1771 864 1803; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">insisted.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000146" title="bbox 884 1771 977 1803; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">“The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000147" title="bbox 990 1771 1068 1813; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">path</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000148" title="bbox 1083 1780 1117 1803; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000149" title="bbox 1132 1771 1329 1813; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">knowledge</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000150" title="bbox 1344 1773 1366 1803; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">is</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000102_000151" title="bbox 1383 1771 1532 1803; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">endless.”</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000105_000003" title="bbox 209 711 1197 749; baseline -0.001 -9; x_size 38; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000004" title="bbox 209 712 258 739; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">An</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000005" title="bbox 273 712 460 749; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">experiment</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000006" title="bbox 476 711 646 740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">conducted</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000009" title="bbox 810 711 917 740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">animal</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000012" title="bbox 1163 722 1197 740; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">or</span>

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000105_000003" title="bbox 161 820 1244 1166">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000105_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 161 820 1244 958" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000105_000005" title="bbox 161 820 552 858; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 10">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000020" title="bbox 161 820 308 849; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">chronic</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000021" title="bbox 326 821 552 858; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">experiment</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000105_000006" title="bbox 209 870 1244 908; baseline 0.001 -10; x_size 39; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000022" title="bbox 209 871 258 898; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">An</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000023" title="bbox 273 871 460 908; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">experiment</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000024" title="bbox 475 870 536 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000025" title="bbox 550 870 652 908; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">begins</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000026" title="bbox 669 870 739 908; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">only</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000027" title="bbox 754 870 825 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">after</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000028" title="bbox 838 870 888 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000029" title="bbox 904 870 1010 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">animal</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000030" title="bbox 1024 870 1073 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">has</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000105_000031" title="bbox 1088 870 1244 899; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">recovered</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000105_000007" title="bbox 210 920 651 958; baseline 0.002 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 10">

 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000105_000010" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 2128 1220 2316" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000086" title="bbox 1529 1286 1644 1315; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 39">stimuli.</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000003" lang="eng" title="bbox 552 1345 788 1374" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000013" title="bbox 552 1345 788 1374; baseline 0 -1; x_size 37.685135; x_descenders 9.6851358; x_ascenders 10">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000087" title="bbox 552 1345 788 1374; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 39">materialism</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000004" lang="eng" title="bbox 603 1395 1596 1433" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000014" title="bbox 603 1395 1596 1433; baseline 0.001 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000088" title="bbox 603 1397 668 1424; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000089" title="bbox 683 1395 899 1433; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">philosophical</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000090" title="bbox 913 1397 991 1424; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">view</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000091" title="bbox 1005 1395 1066 1424; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">that</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000092" title="bbox 1081 1395 1254 1433; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">everything</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000093" title="bbox 1268 1406 1322 1424; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">can</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000094" title="bbox 1336 1395 1373 1424; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">be</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000095" title="bbox 1389 1395 1544 1433; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">explained</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000096" title="bbox 1558 1395 1596 1433; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">by</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000005" lang="eng" title="bbox 603 1445 1000 1483" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000015" title="bbox 603 1445 1000 1483; baseline 0 -10; x_size 37; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 11">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000098" title="bbox 667 1447 828 1483; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 38">properties</span>

 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000006" lang="eng" title="bbox 552 1503 764 1541" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000101" title="bbox 552 1503 764 1541; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">physiology</span>
 </span>
 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000007" lang="eng" title="bbox 603 1553 1589 1591" xml:lang="eng">

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000102" title="bbox 603 1555 668 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000103" title="bbox 684 1555 798 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">science</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000104" title="bbox 814 1553 851 1582; x_wconf 97; x_fsize 40">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000105" title="bbox 859 1553 927 1582; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">vital</span>

 </p>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000008" lang="eng" title="bbox 603 1603 1140 1641" xml:lang="eng">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000106_000009" lang="eng" title="bbox 552 1661 773 1699" xml:lang="eng">

 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000106_000005" title="bbox 552 1770 1626 2491">

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000023" title="bbox 603 1820 1571 1858; baseline 0.001 -10; x_size 39; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000126" title="bbox 603 1820 668 1849; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000127" title="bbox 683 1820 899 1858; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">philosophical</span>

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000025" title="bbox 552 1928 664 1957; baseline 0 -1; x_size 38.409088; x_descenders 10.40909; x_ascenders 10">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000142" title="bbox 552 1928 664 1957; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">reflex</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000026" title="bbox 602 1978 1542 2007; baseline 0.001 -1; x_size 39.409088; x_descenders 10.40909; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000143" title="bbox 602 1979 629 2006; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">A</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000144" title="bbox 644 1978 832 2007; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">determined</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000149" title="bbox 1485 1978 1542 2007; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">and</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000027" title="bbox 603 2038 747 2066; baseline 0.007 -10; x_size 39.652931; x_descenders 10.343512; x_ascenders 11.422819">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000150" title="bbox 603 2038 747 2066; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">response.</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000028" title="bbox 553 2086 959 2115; baseline -0.002 0; x_size 39.987373; x_descenders 10.987372; x_ascenders 10">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000151" title="bbox 553 2086 830 2115; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">unconditional</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000152" title="bbox 846 2086 959 2115; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">reflex</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000029" title="bbox 602 2136 1626 2174; baseline 0.001 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000153" title="bbox 602 2137 651 2164; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 39">An</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000154" title="bbox 665 2136 776 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">inborn</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000155" title="bbox 791 2136 848 2165; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 39">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000156" title="bbox 862 2138 1025 2174; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 39">unvarying</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000159" title="bbox 1393 2147 1407 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">a</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000161" title="bbox 1569 2136 1626 2165; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">and</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000030" title="bbox 603 2196 776 2224; baseline -0.006 -9; x_size 39.652931; x_descenders 10.343512; x_ascenders 11.422819">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000162" title="bbox 603 2197 617 2215; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">a</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000163" title="bbox 632 2196 776 2224; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">response.</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000031" title="bbox 552 2245 709 2274; baseline -0.006 0; x_size 39.987373; x_descenders 10.987372; x_ascenders 10">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000164" title="bbox 552 2245 709 2274; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 41">variable</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000032" title="bbox 602 2295 1571 2333; baseline 0 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000165" title="bbox 602 2296 629 2323; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">A</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000166" title="bbox 643 2295 737 2324; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">factor</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000106_000167" title="bbox 751 2295 812 2324; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">that</span>

 </span>

 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000034" title="bbox 602 2403 1618 2441; baseline 0 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">

 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000106_000035" title="bbox 602 2453 822 2491; baseline 0 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000107_000013" lang="eng" title="bbox 161 1627 1236 1711" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000107_000022" title="bbox 161 1627 1236 1665; baseline 0.001 -10; x_size 39; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000121" title="bbox 161 1628 254 1665; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 40">Cuny,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000122" title="bbox 267 1627 385 1656; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 40">Hilaire.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000123" title="bbox 398 1629 461 1656; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">Ivan</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000124" title="bbox 476 1627 583 1656; x_wconf 74; x_fsize 40">Pavlov:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000125" title="bbox 593 1627 648 1656; x_wconf 74; x_fsize 40">The</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000126" title="bbox 662 1629 732 1656; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">Man</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000127" title="bbox 747 1627 801 1656; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000128" title="bbox 814 1629 867 1656; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">His</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000129" title="bbox 879 1627 1005 1656; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">Theories.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000130" title="bbox 1019 1627 1184 1656; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 40">Translated</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000131" title="bbox 1198 1627 1236 1665; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 40">by</span>
 </span>
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000107_000023" title="bbox 210 1677 855 1711; baseline 0.002 -6; x_size 34; x_descenders 5; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000107_000132" title="bbox 210 1677 325 1706; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 35">Patrick</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000108_000000" lang="eng" title="bbox 548 661 1585 749" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000108_000000" title="bbox 548 661 1585 699; baseline 0 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000000" title="bbox 548 663 672 699; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Boring,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000001" title="bbox 683 661 799 690; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Edwin.</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000003" title="bbox 854 663 965 699; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">History</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000005" title="bbox 1018 661 1218 699; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Experimental</span>

 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000108_000001" lang="eng" title="bbox 549 770 1468 858" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000108_000002" title="bbox 549 770 1468 808; baseline 0 -10; x_size 38; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000011" title="bbox 549 771 679 808; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Fearing,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000012" title="bbox 693 770 836 799; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Franklin.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000013" title="bbox 849 770 945 808; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Reflex</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000014" title="bbox 954 771 1096 799; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 39">Action:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000015" title="bbox 1085 766 1098 813; x_wconf 94; x_fsize 39">A</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000108_000016" title="bbox 1113 770 1198 808; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">Study</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000159" title="bbox 638 2342 685 2371; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">for</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000160" title="bbox 697 2343 874 2380; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">permission</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000161" title="bbox 888 2350 919 2371; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000162" title="bbox 934 2342 1096 2380; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">reproduce</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000163" title="bbox 1111 2342 1161 2371; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 39">the</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000164" title="bbox 1174 2342 1253 2380; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 39">pho-</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000111_000009" title="bbox 160 2392 1254 2430">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000111_000017" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 2392 1254 2430" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_header" id="line_000111_000040" title="bbox 160 2392 1254 2430; baseline 0 -9; x_size 39; x_descenders 10; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000165" title="bbox 160 2399 204 2421; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">tos</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000166" title="bbox 223 2392 301 2421; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">from</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000167" title="bbox 318 2394 352 2421; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">its</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000168" title="bbox 372 2392 539 2421; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 40">collection.</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000169" title="bbox 557 2392 670 2430; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">Special</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000170" title="bbox 688 2392 791 2421; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">thanks</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000171" title="bbox 810 2399 841 2421; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 40">to</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000172" title="bbox 861 2392 985 2421; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 40">Pavlov’s</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000173" title="bbox 1005 2392 1254 2430; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 40">granddaughters</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000111_000010" title="bbox 160 2442 1255 2480">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000111_000018" lang="eng" title="bbox 160 2442 1255 2480" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_header" id="line_000111_000041" title="bbox 160 2442 1255 2480; baseline 0 -9; x_size 38; x_descenders 9; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000174" title="bbox 160 2442 218 2471; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 39">and</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000175" title="bbox 231 2442 572 2480; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 39">great-granddaughter,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000176" title="bbox 583 2442 717 2471; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 39">Ludmila</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000177" title="bbox 730 2442 908 2476; x_wconf 91; x_fsize 39">Balmasova,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000178" title="bbox 919 2443 1016 2471; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 39">Maria</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000180" title="bbox 1198 2442 1255 2471; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 39">and</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 <div class="ocr_carea" id="block_000111_000011" title="bbox 159 2492 469 2521">
 <p class="ocr_par" id="par_000111_000019" lang="eng" title="bbox 159 2492 469 2521" xml:lang="eng">
 <span class="ocr_line" id="line_000111_000042" title="bbox 159 2492 469 2521; baseline 0.003 -1; x_size 34.351353; x_descenders 5.3513513; x_ascenders 11">
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000111_000181" title="bbox 159 2493 278 2521; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 35">Marina</span>

 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000112_000243" title="bbox 923 2508 959 2550; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">of</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000112_000244" title="bbox 965 2510 1100 2540; x_wconf 93; x_fsize 43">Heaven:</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000112_000245" title="bbox 1113 2508 1249 2550; x_wconf 92; x_fsize 43">Ptolomy,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000112_000246" title="bbox 1268 2510 1450 2550; x_wconf 96; x_fsize 43">Copernicus,</span>
 <span class="ocrx_word" id="word_000112_000247" title="bbox 1466 2508 1575 2550; x_wconf 95; x_fsize 43">Kepler.</span>
 </span>
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
